AboutMe.para_1: Hi there! I'm Auguste, but you can also call me Junior Tiemele. I'm a software engineering graduate with a deep passion for all things tech and innovation. When I'm not coding or exploring the latest trends in technology, you'll probably find me diving into sports. As for hobbies, I'm a full-on geek—video games, movies, manga, comics—you name it. Basically, tech and geek culture are what keep me inspired and energized!
AboutMe.para_2: I firmly believe that technology has the power to transform and simplify lives. That’s why I’m driven to develop innovative tech solutions that make a positive impact. My goal is to contribute to creating tools that address societal challenges and enhance people’s quality of life.
AboutMe.para_3: If you're interested in chatting about technology, video games, sports, or work with me, feel free to reach out!

Skill.basic_detail: I know basic things. Actually, I can't make complex project.
Skill.intermediate_detail: I have little experience with that. But I can barely make a complex project.
Skill.advance_detail: I have some experience with that. I can make complex project.
Skill.expert_detail: I have an experience with that. I worked on a lot of projects.
